# CVrisk

## About the package

`CVrisk` is a package to calculate various cardiovascular disease risk
scores.

### Currently available risk scores

- Framingham 2008 10-year ASCVD risk (model with lipid labs)
- Framingham 2008 10-year ASCVD risk (model with BMI)
- ACC/AHA 2013 10-year ASCVD risk
- MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (traditional risk factors)
- MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (using coronary artery calcium)
- **AHA PREVENT 2023 10-year ASCVD risk (base model)** - New!

## Installation

``` r
# Install from CRAN
install.packages("CVrisk")

# Install the development version from GitHub:
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vcastro/CVrisk")
```

## Usage

Calculate a single score:

``` r
library(CVrisk)
ascvd_10y_accaha(race = "aa", gender = "male", age = 55, 
   totchol = 213, hdl = 50, sbp = 140, 
   bp_med = FALSE, smoker=0, diabetes=0)

# Calculate PREVENT risk score (requires additional parameters)
ascvd_10y_prevent(gender = "female", age = 50, sbp = 160, bp_med = 1,
   totchol = 200, hdl = 45, statin = 0, diabetes = 1, smoker = 0,
   egfr = 90, bmi = 35)
   
```

Calculate multiple scores for a dataframe and append scores to the
dataframe:

``` r

# Compute traditional risk scores
compute_CVrisk(sample_data,
   age = "age", race = "race", gender = "gender", bmi = "BMI", sbp = "sbp",
   hdl = "hdl", totchol = "totchol", bp_med = "bp_med", smoker = "smoker",
   diabetes = "diabetes", lipid_med = "lipid_med",
   fh_heartattack = "fh_heartattack", cac = "cac"
)

# To include PREVENT score, specify scores explicitly and provide egfr
compute_CVrisk(my_data,
   scores = c("ascvd_10y_accaha", "ascvd_10y_prevent"),
   age = "age", gender = "gender", sbp = "sbp", 
   hdl = "hdl", totchol = "totchol", bmi = "BMI",
   bp_med = "bp_med", diabetes = "diabetes", smoker = "smoker",
   statin = "lipid_med", egfr = "egfr"
)
```

# Package index

## Compute multiple risk scores

- [`compute_CVrisk()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/compute_CVrisk.md)
  : Compute multiple CV risk scores

## Individual risk scores

- [`ascvd_10y_frs()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/ascvd_10y_frs.md)
  : Framingham 2008 ASCVD risk score (with lab measurement)
- [`ascvd_10y_frs_simple()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/ascvd_10y_frs_simple.md)
  : Framingham 2008 ASCVD risk score (no lab measurement)
- [`ascvd_10y_accaha()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/ascvd_10y_accaha.md)
  : ACC/AHA 2013 ASCVD risk score
- [`chd_10y_mesa()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/chd_10y_mesa.md)
  : MESA 2015 CHD risk score
- [`chd_10y_mesa_cac()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/chd_10y_mesa_cac.md)
  : MESA 2015 CHD risk score with CAC
- [`ascvd_10y_prevent()`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/ascvd_10y_prevent.md)
  : PREVENT 10-year ASCVD risk score (base model)

## Supporting datasets

- [`sample_data`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/sample_data.md)
  : Sample patient data
- [`frs_coef`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/frs_coef.md) :
  Model coefficients for ASCVD 10y FRS model
- [`frs_simple_coef`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/frs_simple_coef.md)
  : Model coefficients for ASCVD 10y FRS simple model
- [`ascvd_pooled_coef`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/ascvd_pooled_coef.md)
  : Model coefficients for ASCVD 10y ACC/AHA model
- [`mesa_cac_coef`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/mesa_cac_coef.md)
  : mesa_cac_coef
- [`mesa_coef`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/mesa_coef.md)
  : mesa_coef

## Package info

- [`CVrisk`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/CVrisk-package.md)
  [`CVrisk-package`](https://vcastro.github.io/CVrisk/reference/CVrisk-package.md)
  : CVrisk: Compute Risk Scores for Cardiovascular Diseases
